transArray.content: There is a magical remote control that I don’t understand what it does. The room is relatively small and there’s not much else.

Hello dear guest! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and taking your precious time to share your stay experience with us. It is our honor to have a clean and comfortable stay. The hotel is located in the Badali Automobile Park on the West Fourth Ring Road. The number of parking spaces shared with the park Ample parking, convenient parking, and time flies. We are deeply honored to be able to give you an impressive stay. Thank you for your recognition of us. The hotel room size is limited by the rental property space. Although the hotel is small, it is well-equipped. The room facilities and equipment can meet your daily needs when you are away from home. In addition to the TV and air-conditioning remote control, the room is also equipped with electric Curtain remote control, if you have any questions during your stay in the store, you can contact our staff at any time. We will be by your side wholeheartedly 24 hours a day. Only with your support can all the staff of Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel move forward. I am full of confidence on the road and look forward to seeing you again. I wish you all the best during your holiday! Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
